summary:
The Security Council,

Recalling previous resolutions and presidential statements on Sudan and South Sudan,

Recognizing the situation in Abyei and along the Sudan-South Sudan border continues to threaten international peace and security,

Decides to extend UNISFA's mandate modification, as set forth in resolution 2024 (2011) and paragraph 1 of resolution 2075 (2012), until 23 April 2018;

Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
